title: FS - T206 Hall of Famers PSA 4's
author: Kingcobb

posts.post_title: FS - T206 Hall of Famers PSA 4's
posts.post_content:
I was able to upgrade these 3 cards recently and have these 3 nice T206's PSA 4's for sale. Paypal is preferred and prices include fully insured shipping. Prices came from recent PSA 4 on EBAY sales which were shocking to me.          Thanks Daryl
Chief Bender - Sold
Jack Chesboro - Sold
Rube Waddell - Sold
